title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 5103 - Video Lottery Gaming Agents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 5103 - Video Lottery Gaming Agents

State Regulations
§ 5103.1 - Entities permitted to obtain a video lottery gaming agent license
§ 5103.2 - Video lottery gaming agent and principal application and disclosure form
§ 5103.3 - General information requirements
§ 5103.4 - Duration of license and license conditions
§ 5103.5 - Bonding of video lottery gaming agents
§ 5103.6 - Indemnification and hold harmless
§ 5103.7 - Relationship
§ 5103.8 - Gaming facility insurance requirements

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 5103

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 104 [1], [19], 128

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
